rules.description: Post escape if left_control is pressed alone.
Quit application by pressing command-q twice
Esc to ` when pressed with Command or Shift
Use option+1/2/3/4 to switch language to English, Chinese, Japanese(Hirakana), Japanese(Katakana), respectively.
Post Escape if Command_R is pressed alone.
Post escape if left_control is pressed alone.
Quit application by pressing command-q twice
Esc to ` when pressed with Command or Shift
Use option+1/2/3/4 to switch language to English, Chinese, Japanese(Hirakana), Japanese(Katakana), respectively.
